name: Bug Plague - Play on Watch
description:
The rules of the game are simple, try to exterminate the plague ... (assumes that you can never exterminate them completely).

For iPhone available 3 levels: 25, 50 and 100 bugs.
For Apple Watch available 3 levels: 10, 20 and 30 bugs.

The insects are very elusive, maybe you will have to press several times on it to eliminate! Spiders, ticks, mosquitoes, cockroaches, etc. may appear

Control the insect plague!
